title: SMFG India credit eyes AUM growth after capital infusion
description: Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group has taken full ownership of SMFG India Credit Co by increasing its stake to 100%. A Rs 1300 crore rights issue raised the company's capital adequacy ratio to 19.1%. CEO Shantanu Mitra projects a 29% growth in consolidated assets under management for the current fiscal year.
